items.headline: Mastering Alcohol, Mixology, Pairing & Enjoying Life’s Finer Things
objectives_summary: An in-depth understanding of Gin including it's history, how it's made, and production regions.
Understand the differences of all 6 different types of Gin
Recognizing flavors and aromas in Gin

items.headline: The Ideal Baking Course to Master Sourdough Breads & Pastries  - Start Baking Artisan Breads & Croissants with Sourdough
objectives_summary: How to bake your favorite Sourdough Breads & Pastries from the comfort of your own home
The differences & advantages between various types of Flours - From Cake Wheat to Rye
Learn & Master multiple world famous Sourdough Recipes

items.title: Mirror Glaze White Chocolate Mousse Cake Master Course
items.headline: Learn how to bake amazing french mousse cakes that melt in the mouth and look like colorful marble and mirror.
objectives_summary: Master an amazing, unique, and breathtaking mirror glaze mousse cake
Make coconut dacquoise.
Make strawberry confit

items.title: Wine For All - Learn Wine from a Certified WSET Level III
items.headline: Learn How to Taste Wine, Pairing with food, and so much more. Become an Expert in no time!
objectives_summary: How to Taste Wine
The Main Wine Regions of the World
The Main Grape Varieties and Common Wine Blends

items.title: Japanese Popular Dishes Cooking Class
items.headline: Find Japanese food culture and improve basic cooking skills
objectives_summary: Learn real Japanese food from a professional instructor!
Understand the most important element for Japanese food, DASHI and UMAMI flavor. Understanding the combination of DASHI is the first step to authentic Japanese food.
Master five different types of popular Japanese dishes step-by-step with basic techniques. All totally different dishes with different skills gradually lead you to the next step.

items.title: Classic Trattoria Cooking with Chef Marco Barbaro
items.headline: Learn how to prepare Classic Italian Trattoria meals, cooking tips and restaurant secrets from one of America's best.
objectives_summary: Cook classic Italian family restaurant style recipes, with simplicity and traditional flavor.
Understand the necessary, core ingredients to classic Italian family restaurant cooking.
Set your kitchen up with efficiency and ease, understanding the basic elements of authentic Italian cooking.

items.title: Learn to Bake Great Pizza at Home
items.headline: You can bake Pizzeria Style Pizza in your Home Oven! Learn about pizza dough & recipes for many regional styles of pizza
objectives_summary: Select the best oven for baking pizza at home
Equip a home kitchen for baking pizza
Select the right ingredients for great pizza

items.title: Fondant Character Modelling for Cake Makers - Sea Creatures
items.headline: Learn how to make 16 fondant sea life themed characters plus all accessories
objectives_summary: Learn how to model a whole host of fantastic sea creatures
Master all of the basic character modelling skills

items.title: Taste Coffee Like a Pro
items.headline: Elevate your daily coffee ritual by learning the step-by-step process that professionals use to evaluate coffee.
objectives_summary: Learn to evaluate and discuss coffee quality like a professional coffee taster
Get a step-by-step guide to professional coffee cupping (tasting)
Discover 8 ways coffee experts determine if coffee is good

items.title: Raw Vegan Desserts--Gluten and Dairy-Free
items.headline: Every Dessert You Love Made Easier and Healthier, but Just As Delicious!
objectives_summary: Discover the secrets to replacing “bad” fats and processed sugars with just the right combinations of better fats and natural sweeteners—creating amazing desserts that taste like the ones you’ve always loved but are far better for you.
Set up your kitchen and stock your pantry so that a decadent, yet healthy treat is always easy to prepare.
A printable recipe guide.

items.title: Cooking Eggs: The Best Recipes for Cheap & Healthy Cooking
items.headline: All the different ways to cook this common food item. Cooking techniques, demos, & recipes
objectives_summary: Expertly prepare a wide variety of eggs in their most delicious form.
Know by heart the easiest methods for poaching, frying, scrambling & boiling.
Present gorgeous, simple, hearty meals for family and friends.

items.title: Coffee Roasting Program

objectives_summary: you'll having the whole idea of roasting coffee processing
you'll get more information for green bean and roasted coffee storage and defect
Coffee quality control

items.title: Noodles Mastery Course

objectives_summary: You will master the art of cooking Asian noodles
You will be able to identify the different types of noodles
You will master the intricacies of many Asian ingredients, their uses and substitutes

items.title: Easy, Healthy, Crockpot Cooking!  Cooking Lessons for Dad!
items.headline: Cooking Lessons for Dad will help you master your crockpot or slow cooker! Learn how to cook easy, healthy recipes!
objectives_summary: Cook many easy, healthy delicious recipes in a crockpot or slow cooker
Recognize the many benefits of cooking in a crockpot
Adapt favorite recipes for crockpot cooking

items.title: Cooking Lessons for Dad: Learn to Cook Food the Easy Way!
items.headline: Cooking lessons for beginners. Learn how to cook healthy, delicious food the easy way! Simple instructions and recipes!
objectives_summary: Prepare a huge variety of simple, delicious, healthy recipes.
Make more than 30 great recipes!
Use many new cooking skills and methods.
